title: Help, Purchasing Rp with paypal in old league client wont wont.
body: Hey now that i think of it, i should try the new client. But still i tried buying Rp with Paypall 20$s and its keep saying "An error occurred during processing. Please try again." and At this time, we are unable to request. Please return to Riot Games inc, and try another option. I tried over and over again many times yesterday and its keep telling me the same today.  Pls all i want is a new skin right now lol.

replies.body:
This error could be caused by a few different factors. Since the old client relies on Internet Explorer settings, there could be a setting causing your issues. For this, I'd recommend working through our [**Store Issues Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660), as it covers common IE setting configurations that usually fix this.

Let me know if this caused any change.
So, i tried a different Paypal account and it worked, no errors all perfect, weird. Thx for the help though.
